children.description:

1. Check if there are any other tools or APIs available that can provide meme templates and font information.
2. If not, inform the user that the requested tool is currently unavailable and suggest alternative options for creating memes.

function.name: search_for_meme_generator_and_template_database
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "meme_generator_and_template_database", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns meme templates that contain a specific string. **searchString is case sensitive**"

function.name: fonts_for_meme_generator_and_template_database
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "meme_generator_and_template_database", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Any of the fonts can be used  in any text box or caption.
Some fonts are language specific:
- Chinese -> zcool-wenyi
- Japanese -> takaopmincho
-  Korean -> gugi
- Hindi -> poppins"

function.name: templates_for_meme_generator_and_template_database
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "meme_generator_and_template_database", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns all of the currently supported templates and the number of text boxes that a particular template can support. For how to use this response go to **/template/:image**."

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"
